EXISTING STRUCTURES
──────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage depot.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]).
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper plates (status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warnings: ["no ingredients to smelt"]; note: fuel inventory updated with coal and energy at 1600).

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science pack(s) for research (status: NO_POWER; research: automation; electrical id updated to 2752).
- Connected small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5) forming an electricity network.
- Electricity provided via ElectricityGroup with id=2752.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for electricity generation (status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for steam production (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]; fluid system: [8708]; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); contains water in its fluid_box).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction (status: WORKING; fluid system: [8708]).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
    • PipeGroup with fluid_system=8708 at position(-6.5, 20.5) (status: WORKING)
    • PipeGroup with fluid_system=8709 at position(-2.5, 20.5) (status: EMPTY)
    • PipeGroup with fluid_system=8710 at position(-0.5, 21.5) (status: EMPTY)
    • PipeGroup with fluid_system=8715 at position(-3.5, 23.5) (status: EMPTY)
    • PipeGroup with fluid_system=8714 at position(-7.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY)
    • PipeGroup with fluid_system=8719 at position(3.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY)
    • PipeGroup with fluid_system=8718 at position(2.5, 24.5) (status: EMPTY)
    • PipeGroup with fluid_system=8721 at position(-0.5, 28.5) (status: EMPTY)
- Electricity connectivity linked via ElectricityGroup id=2752.

ERROR TIPS
──────────────────────
• Fluid System Connection Attempts:
  - Multiple attempts to supply water to the steam engine using fluid_system IDs [8020, 8063, 8106, 8149, 8192, 8235, 8278, 8321] (previous) and [8364, 8407, 8450, 8493, 8536, 8579, 8622, 8665] (current) have all failed due to referencing non-active PipeGroups.
  - Tip: Validate the fluid_system ID against the current, active pipeline network before initiating connection attempts.

• Unproductive Stabilization Waits:
  - Repeated 10-second delays after unsuccessful connection attempts do not resolve the connectivity issue.
  - Tip: Confirm pipeline network stability and ensure proper alignment before applying delays to avoid redundant waiting periods.

• Persistent Steam Engine Connection Failure:
  - Continuous failure to connect the steam engine through multiple connection attempts indicates a misalignment between its connection points and a confirmed working PipeGroup.
  - Tip: Double-check that the steam engine is directly aligned with an active PipeGroup in the updated pipeline network to facilitate proper water input.
